com.aston.group.stationdefender.screens

Class TwoTextScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.screens.TwoTextScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class TwoTextScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    TwoTextScreen is a class that creates a screen holding a title text, a body of text, a back button and an optional continue button.
